title: Unsupervised
description:
It was just a little white lie...
NiallI have twenty-eight days to find the perfect wife...As a sought-after photographer with a sexy Irish accent, I have no problem attracting women. Especially crazy ones whose position in my company have me backed into a corner.The solution is simple: find a fake fiancée and save my job. A chance meeting with a tall blonde seems almost too good to be true. Beautiful, sane, and she has a kid? We have a winner.I planned everything...except falling for her. A lie brought us together, but I have no intention of letting her go.LakenI can't buy my way onto Madison Avenue...Whoever said hard work pays off never applied for a marketing internship in New York City. I just received my fifth rejection letter, but I won't give up. I'll bide my time while playing nanny to the overprivileged.Then one outrageous proposal changes everything, and I find myself fake engaged with a fake new family. I'd tell him the kid isn't mine, but there's a problem. My new "fiancé" is a photographer for my dream company. He's my "in."If I can hold on to this charade, I'll get the job and the man. Game on.
author: Cora Kenborn
